title: CPU usage abnormal for {{snmp_device.name}} in namespace {{device_namespace.name}}
description: Monitors CPU usage on your SNMP devices to alert you when usage data appears abnormal on a weekly basis (i.e. this monday vs. last monday)

definition.name: [SNMP] CPU usage abnormal for {{snmp_device.name}} in namespace {{device_namespace.name}}
definition.query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:snmp.cpu.usage{*} by {device_namespace,snmp_device}, 'agile', 2, direction='both', interval=60, alert_window='last_15m', count_default_zero='true', seasonality='weekly') >= 1
